articles.title: After calling police, Conn. man kills terminally ill wife and then himself
articles.description:
John Ezzell informed 911 dispatchers that his wife, Christine, was suffering from terminal cancer and he intended to take her life and then his own.

The post After calling police, Conn. man kills terminally ill wife and then himself appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: John Ezzell killed his terminally ill wife Christine before taking his own life.
Ezzell called 911 to report his intentions, highlighting mental health concerns.
This incident raises awareness about end-of-life issues affecting Boston residents.

articles.title: US men’s hockey team feted at State of the Union; Trump says women’s team will be honored ‘soon’
articles.description:
“I want to thank you all,” Trump said to the players. “What a special job you did. What special champions you are."

The post US men’s hockey team feted at State of the Union; Trump says women’s team will be honored ‘soon’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: US men's hockey team recognized at State of the Union on February 25, 2026.
Trump praised the team's performance, calling them 'special champions.'
Boston residents celebrate local athletes' achievements on a national stage.
